admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The project which the Bank is financing
            is the irrigation of two separate land units, Pyongtaek and
            Kumgang. It also includes the preparation by consultants of
            an improved seeds multiplication project. The project under
            consideration would involve pumping water from river
            estuaries into canals to irrigate land in adjacent valleys
            and on lower slopes. Construction in the Kumgang area would
            take about three years and that in the Pyongtaek area about five.
